text: Essence Music is an independent record label based in Juiz de Fora, Brazil. All the albums are released in a standard edition and a special edition, which is a hand-made box including the standard edition of the album, various inserts, and usually a bonus disc. ==Artists== ==References== ==External links== * Essence Music official website * Category:Brazilian independent record labels Category:Ambient music record labels Category:Experimental music record labels Category:Noise music record labels Category:Psychedelic rock record labels Category:Record labels established in 2003
title: Essence Music
